title: The man in the corner /
author: Orczy, Emmuska Orczy
snippet: As soon as James Funnel  has passed on, John Ashley, having opened the gate, lifts the body of Aaron Cohen in his arms and carries him across the Square. The Square is deserted, of course, but the way is easy enough, and we must presume that Ashley had been in it before. Anyway, there was no fear of meeting anyone.
